physical_appearance:A Second World War bayonet frog used by the British army is displayed. It is khaki in colour. At the right hand side of the middle of the image
 a button is visible on the sheath. There is a slight tear on the bayonet frog. The stitching on the sheath can be seen running around its perimeter
 as well as towards the middle.

 which soldiers carried to sheath their bayonets.

The stitching on the sheath can be seen running around its perimeter, as well as towards the middle.
